name: SHREVEPORT AREA TRANSIT SYSTEM (SPORTRAN)
sampleDescriptions: Support grant applications at USDOT. Monitor issues related to infrastructure programs in FY23 Budget Request.
Support grant applications at USDOT. Monitor issues related to infrastructure programs in FY23 T-HUD Appropriations bills.
